name: Practo
description: As India's leading integrated healthcare company, Practo has been on a mission to make quality healthcare accessible and affordable to all by connecting the entire healthcare ecosystem including patients, doctors, clinics, hospitals, pharmacies, and diagnostics in a seamless and cohesive manner. Practo effortlessly streamlines the patient's healthcare journey right from primary healthcare, viz. finding and booking an appointment with verified doctors, consulting doctors online with ETA as low as 60 seconds, getting medicines delivered and lab tests conducted at home, providing health plans to corporates, to secondary healthcare procedures.
Headline: Your Workplace Health and Wellness Partner
ShortDescription: Making quality healthcare affordable and accessible to over a billion+ Indians

Highlights.name: Connect
Highlights.description: We understand healthcare goes beyond signs, symptoms, diagnosis, and treatment.

Highlights.name: Trust
Highlights.description: We are aware of the responsibility placed on us by 30 crore+ patients and over a lakh doctors.

Highlights.name: Transparency
Highlights.description: We believe in communicating openly and honestly, and holding ourselves to the highest ethical standards.

enhanced_description: Practo, India's leading integrated healthcare company, is dedicated to making quality healthcare accessible and affordable for all. It seamlessly connects the entire healthcare ecosystem, including patients, doctors, clinics, hospitals, pharmacies, and diagnostics. The platform streamlines the patient's healthcare journey from primary care, offering features like finding and booking appointments with verified doctors, online consultations with an ETA as low as 60 seconds, and at-home services for medicine delivery and lab tests, to secondary healthcare procedures. Positioned as 'Your Workplace Health and Wellness Partner', Practo also extends its services to corporates by providing health plans, functioning as a corporate wellness software, benefits administration software, and health & safety provider, with a core business objective to improve employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Finding and booking appointments with verified doctors
Provision of health plans to corporates
competitive_advantages: India's leading integrated healthcare company status
Comprehensive ecosystem integration (patients, doctors, clinics, hospitals, pharmacies, diagnostics)
Fast online doctor consultation (ETA as low as 60 seconds)
High user and provider trust (30 crore+ patients and over a lakh doctors)
Commitment to transparency and ethical standards
roi_benefits: Enhanced accessibility and affordability of healthcare for employees
